forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 11pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 54, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a shroud of soft, muted clouds, perhaps hinting at the lingering whispers of winter's embrace. The air feels cool, with the temperature floating just around 59 degrees, offering a gentle chill that is likely to dip as the afternoon wears on. A light breeze from the west-southwest rustles through the streets, intertwining with the whispers of the city. As dusk approaches, you may notice the first tentative drizzles of rain, a quiet promise of moisture in the evening air, with a chance of precipitation beginning late tonight.

For those venturing out today, a light jacket will serve well against the coolness, complemented by layers that allow for the oscillations of temperature. Perhaps a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a quiet moment in one of the city’s many cafés will suffice, as the clouds loom gentle overhead, casting a warm ambiance that invites reflection. The streets carry the potential for tranquility; take it slow, savor the subtle charm of a city softly veiled in maritime mist, allowing it to guide your thoughts.
